suggestions.original: To improve the color richness of the artwork, consider adding a background with complementary colors. This could include a sky, trees, or other environmental elements that provide context and depth. Additionally, incorporating subtle gradients or patterns in the background can enhance the overall visual appeal without overwhelming the main subjects. This will create a more immersive and vibrant scene, further engaging the viewer.
